FuncDef: The display mpls l2vpn qos vsi-name command displays QoS information based on a specified VSI.
CLIs: display mpls l2vpn qos vsi-name <vsi-name> [ peer <peer-id> [ pw-id <pw-id> ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a VSI name.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the IPv4 address of a peer router.
The value is an IPv4 address in dotted decimal notation (X.X.X.X), for example, 10.1.1.1.

Specifies the L2VC ID for a PW.
The value is an integer ranging from 1 to 4294967295.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The VPN services carried over a tunnel have different resource requirements. To meet the resource requirements of L2VPN services carried over a tunnel without affecting the quality of other VPN services, configure L2VPN QoS. To check QoS information about L2VPN after QoS is configured, run the display mpls l2vpn qos command.
